newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Cenbank sells 6.19 bln reais in bonds.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Cenbank sells 6.19 bln reais in bonds.

text.p: Brazil's Central Bank sold 6.19 billion reais in 56-day and 182-day Central Bank Bonds (BBCs) at its weekly formal bond auction Tuesday, dealers said.
The Central Bank sold 4.37 billion reais in 56-day bonds at an overnight rate of 2.367 percent a month, down from 2.406 percent last week.
The 182-day bonds were sold at 2.235 percent a month, down from 2.311 percent, totalling 1.82 billion reais.
The auction's result was in line with market expectations, dealers said.
The financial result of the auction indicated 310 million reais will be added to the banking system as 6.5 billion reais in 56-day old bonds are coming due Wednesday.
